predicate.note: Frames file for 'resonate' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 47.4, sound existence.

example.name: normally inchoative
example.text: It was a profoundly moving moment for series television, and Robert Loggia's acting resonated in the silence.

example.name: with additional description
example.text: It's set in New York, but it resonates with the terrible dynamics of the Latin American drug wars.
example.arg: the terrible dynamics of the Latin American drug wars
